  1. Home
  2. Departments

The Falfurrias Public Utilities Department provides residents with the ability to access various utility services, including water, sewer, gas, and garbage disposal. Our team is available for any questions or concerns you may have about accessing and maintaining your utility services. Utilities services can now be paid online, through our utilities portal below, for your convenience!

Beginning March 2024, Cash Payment for Services Will No Longer Be Accepted

In an effort to reduce the risk associated with cash in the office, the City of Falfurrias will no longer accept CASH payments.

You can also pay over the phone with our automated IVR by calling: 877-752-0176

Or pay online by visiting the Municipal Online Payment Website

Visit the Utility Portal - Pay Online Site

Our department is responsible for collecting payments for water, sewer, gas, and garbage services. You can now pay your utility services online , 24/7, or in person at 215 E Allen Street, Falfurrias, TX 78355, during open hours from 8 am to 4:45 pm, Monday through Friday.

New residents/businesses requesting utility services with the City of Falfurrias must apply for utility services at City Hall, 215 E Allen Street, Falfurrias, TX 78355, during open hours from 8 am to 4:45 pm, Monday through Friday.

Residents/businesses requesting the disconnection or transfer of utility services with the City of Falfurrias must do so in person at City Hall, 215 E Allen Street, Falfurrias, TX 78355, during open hours from 8 am to 4:45 pm, Monday through Friday.

  • 911 Address (Contact: Anna Garcia, 361-325-5670, ext. 369)

Visit the Water and Sewer Fees Website
